title: Honey Peanut Granola
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) porridge oats', '75g (3 oz) chopped peanuts', '4 tablespoons wheatgerm', '5 tablespoons honey', '5 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons warm water', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
